name: Just a minute!
description:
** FOR COMPLETE IMMERSION PLEASE USE HEADPHONES **

This game was made during the McGameJam 2017th edition.

The theme: ''Simulation''

Synopsis: You have to finish that damn level, but the whole world is against you! Manage real life situations while trying to play a video game.

Game Controls (Gamepad):
Start/Pause (Start)
Jump (A)
Interact (X)
Move in-game in-game (D-Pad)
Move in-game not in-game (Analogue)

Game Controls (Keyboard):
Start/Pause (Enter)
Jump (Space)
Interact (Left Click)
Move in-game in-game (Arrow Keys)
Move in-game not in-game (WASD)
